events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue was identified as a refund request based on the customer's description of dissatisfaction with the product.
The case was assigned to the refund support team to handle the customer's refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund. I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product so we can process your refund?
The order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the product does not match the description on the website.
We have approved your refund request. Please send the item back within 14 days using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for providing the shipping label. I will return the product as soon as possible.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should be credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As your refund has been completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
